name: uDOS Vibe
description: Universal Development Operating System with Vibe-CLI integration
goal: Provide a deterministic, offline-first operating system for creative and development workflows
definition_of_done: Production-ready, 100% tested, documented, and deployed across all supported platforms

routing_rules: User → Vibe-CLI → OK Provider → ucode → Core/Wizard

components.wizard: Extended, networked functionality with OK Provider integrations

guidelines:
1. Respect core/wizard separation
2. Use ucode command layer
3. Follow OK terminology policy
4. Test before commit
5. Document architectural decisions
process: 1. Plan → 2. Implement → 3. Test → 4. Document → 5. Review → 6. Deploy
